mapper.sql: id, roleid, rolename, receiveId, receivedname, status, data, data2, yin, message
mapper.select:
select
from youjian where status in('已读','已领取') and receiveId = #{receiveid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by data desc

select
from youjian where status not in('已领取','已退回')
mapper.insert: insert into youjian ( roleid, rolename, receiveId, receivedname, status, data, data2, yin, message) values (#{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receivedname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{data2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{yin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into youjian
id,
roleid,
rolename,
receiveId,
receivedname,
status,
data,
data2,
yin,

mapper.update:
update youjian
roleid = #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rolename = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiveId = #{receiveid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receivedname = #{receivedname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data = #{data,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
data2 = #{data2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yin = #{yin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
